function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Promotion of telecommuting as a result of perceived benefits for women may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases due to reduced physical distancing and increased indoor contact.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation due to higher indoor presence and reduced physical distancing.","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation and ventilation measures in home workspaces, and promote staggered telecommuting schedules to reduce indoor occupancy.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection, and smart scheduling software for telecommuting.","People":"Women who telecommute, and their families who may be exposed to increased disease spread.","Owner":"Employers, public health agencies, and telecommuting technology providers."}]}
